data.title: Software Listing: GIMP
data.meta_description: GIMP is a free and open-source raster graphics editor used for image retouching and editing, free-form drawing, converting between different image formats, and more specialized tasks.
data.text:
GIMP

Vendor

The GIMP Team

Vendor Website

https://www.gimp.org

Description

GIMP is a free and open-source raster graphics editor used for image retouching and editing, free-form drawing, converting between different image formats, and more specialized tasks.

License Information

Current Version

2.10.18

License Type

GNU Freeware

License Effective Dates

N/A

Products Included

GIMP for Linux, macOS & Windows

Terms of Use

https://www.gnu.org/philosophy/free-sw.html

Getting This Service

How to Access

This application is available in the following technology labs:

Computer Labs

Fairfax: Johnson Center, Room 342 & Innovation Hall, Room 301

Mason Square: Van Metre Building, Room 211

Science and Technology: Katherine G. Johnson Hall, Room 250

This software is available online in the Citrix Virtual Lab.

Support

Getting Help

While approved for use, there is no ITS support for the application. Please contact the vendor directly for support.

Support Level
